attributes.action: Not to allow Milton Keynes to host any games in the world cup it would be a kick in the teeth for real football suporters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allowing Milton Keynes to be a host in the 2018 world cup is against the true british football fans wishes. There would be so much dislike of this that it would count against Englands world cup bid

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
